description:
Dan is a big, sexy, muscular guy. He had seen on our travel schedule that we were going to be in his home town so he sent us an e-mail expressing his interest in modeling for our camera.
When I first met him, I had him pegged as 100% straight. So I was really surprised when he told me that he considers himself bisexual and that he has had sexual encounters with other men. I think that's really, really cool. Of course, the first thing I did was try to get him to do more than a solo video, but he's in a relationship and wasn't ready to take that step.
Dan was a little intimidating at first. He didn't say much and he outweighs me by a good 50 pounds. Even so, I felt totally comfortable around him. He's very nice and he smiles a lot. Plus, he's a cummer (watch and you'll see!)
title: Dan
